    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultRequestHandler

        public IRequestHandler getDefaultRequestHandler()
        Provide an implementation here to handle requests that have not been processed by other request handlers. Typically the task to be done in that case is to return an error message to the client. The default implementation simply issues a server error (500) and returns "Resource not found!"

      • add

        public void add(IRequestHandler<APPRUNTIME> handler)
        Add a request handler.

      • start

        public boolean start()
        Start the server. This method will use the defined logger in order to write log messages.
        Returns:
        Returns true on success. If false either the server has already been started or an error occurred.

      • stop

        public boolean stop()
